overview: What if inside each person exist an unique song, a genetic code composed by notes and musical scale, a melody that reflects what we are as human beings, as a person, our qualities, faults, our fears, our forces, all what’s good and evil that pulses in our veins? Imagine now that you had the skill to hear those melodies, the gift of listening to people. The gift or maybe it’s the curs? This is the story of a man with that ability…
title: Silêncio
